Text.Page:
We may be undermanned here, but we're actually oversupplied, . A lot of this stuff is just gonna rot in the jungle.

That benefits no one! I can't abide such waste.

I'm on supply duty this week, and I got this anonymous note: "Trade supplies for coinâ€”secret passage to west."

I'm not saying do the deal, and I'm not saying don't do the deal. I'm saying you should see who shows up at whatever "secret passage" you find.

Great supplies, yes...thank you.

You like working with Dirken, yes? Drives a hard bargain, he does!

You're not Dirken! And no supplies? Outrage!

We complain to Dirken! And maybe kill you, yes?

Wait...they thought we were working with Dirken?

Um, , that isn't exactly good for our careers.

Wait a minute. That means Dirken is selling federation supplies to the pirates, doesn't it?
